abstract: Hello! This is my first post on this blog. I wanted to have a short write up as to why I made this blog. There are a few reasons to be blogging in 2024 despite it being a bit nerdy. I tried to explore some of them here and explain why I am here online.
title: Why If{init}

abstract: A short write up of how this blog was made. Covering all the tools I use to run this blog, from AWS hosting, Python for converting Markdown and how I use Json to display each post and display data on each post.
title: How If{init}
